title: ‘More and More Excitement:’ Paris-Nice Star Olav Kooij Counting Weeks to Debut Giro d’Italia
content:
Dutchman is emerging star in world of sprinting, and will join forces with Wout van Aert in Visma stage blitz at Italian grand tour.

Read the full article at ‘More and More Excitement:’ Paris-Nice Star Olav Kooij Counting Weeks to Debut Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: sstokes
